1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith interviews Marissa Jaret Winokur and gets Valentine's Day tips from Gregory Zarian on the season 3 premiere of Go Curvy. Plus, Pia Schiavo-Campo begins her series on body confidence and talks to Sherry Lee about "Selfie Esteem." Sherry Lee also heads to Downtown Los Angeles to check out an #LASwapaholics event hosted by Marcy Guevara and Jen Wilder. Chad Lewis tells you about our website of the week - Lily Sweetz, and Rona Berry-Morin shares her outfit of the day.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Hayley Hasselhoff answers your fashion questions on a brand new episode of Go Curvy. Sherry Lee Meredith and Brandon Aki talk about the difference between Mr. Right and Mr. Right Now. Plus, Pia Schiavo-Campo's series on body confidence continues with a discussion about fighting diet culture.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Lifestyle expert Gregory Zarian stops by Go Curvy and gives his tips for de-stressing at work. Sherry Lee Meredith and Pia Schiavo-Campo continue their body confidence series with a discussion on this week's topic - healthy at every size. Scotty Grand performs "Where We Belong" from his new album and Rona Berry-Morin shares her outfit of the day. Plus, makeup artist Arlene Martinez gives you some quick and easy tips for contouring your face.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith and Chad Lewis head to Hollywood for a special episode of Go Curvy. Dating expert Brandon Aki stops by to answer your questions and Taylor Petenbrink shares her tips for a quick and easy braided headband.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Gregory Zarian to the Go Curvy couch to answer your questions. Plus, Marlo Bernier and Jennifer Fontaine stop by to discuss their new pilot, Myrna, and actress Linda Weinrib reflects on her lifelong career in entertainment. Sherry Lee and Pia Schiavo-Campo continue their discussion on body confidence. Finally, stylist Taylor Petenbrink shows you an easy style that's great to try if you have short hair.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Join Sherry Lee Meredith and friends for the debut episode of Go Curvy!

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Joanne Rallo, Chenese Lewis and Marcy Guevara for some Spicy Girl Talk on Go Curvy.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Joanne Rallo, Marcy Guevara, and Chenese Lewis for some Spicy Girl Talk on Go Curvy.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Shalon Dozier, Veronica Pome'e, and Tinder Badhesha to the Go Curvy couch for some Spicy Girl Talk.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith has some Spicy Girl Talk with Marie Denee, Marcy Guevara, and Veronica Pome'e on Go Curvy.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Joanne Rallo, Priscilla Katerena and Shalon Dozier for some Spicy Girl Talk on Go Curvy.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith talks to designer Theary Sim about her Youtheary Khmer collection.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Tinder Badhesha, Marcy Guevara, and Shalon Dozier for some Spicy Girl Talk.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: It's a Super Bowl special on Go Curvy! Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes special guest and former Los Angeles Ram LeRoy Irvin to talk about the big game.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Musician Katrina Parker stops by "Go Curvy" to talk to Sherry Lee Meredith and perform on the show. Plus, Pia Schiavo-Campo, Dellany Peace and Gio Messale join Sherry for some Spicy Girl Talk

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Relationship and lifestyle expert Gregory Zarian makes his debut on the Go Curvy couch. Sherry Lee Meredith has some Spicy Girl Talk with Gregory, Dellany Peace and Kelly Glover. Plus, Sherry interviews Sharlene Borromeo, owner and independent designer of A'doreus.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes special guest Meghan Tonjes for a live performance and some Spicy Girl Talk. Sherry also checks out Go Curvy cameraman Mason Hallberg's improv group Weird on Top.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Kelly Glover, Gio Messale, and Teagan Brooke for some Spicy Girl Talk on this week's Go Curvy. Sherry also interviews designer Eden Miller and catches up with model Danika Brysha in New York.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith interviews author Sue Ann Jaffarian and has some Spicy Girl Talk with Kelly Glover, Dellany Peace and Christopher Styles. Plus, Christopher gives three crew members hair makeovers.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes special guest Hayley Hasselhoff to Go Curvy. Plus, Sherry interviews author Alice Clayton and has some Spicy Girl Talk with Joanne Rallo, Gio Messale, and Dellany Peace.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith has some Spicy Girl Talk with Jamie Litt, Kelly Glover, and Dellany Peace. Plus, Paul Zahn shows Sherry how to mix a spring cocktail. In beauty, Christopher Styles and Brittney Yarbrough trade jobs for the episode when Christopher does makeup and Brittney does hair on model Teagan Brooke.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by lifestyle and wellness expert Gregory Zarian, Dellany Peace and Joanne Rallo for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus Gregory Zarian shares his advice on spring cleaning your life. Then Christopher Styles gives Teagan Brooke a high-bun and Brittney Yarbrough shows you how to get perfect sun-kissed makeup.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Eva Tingley, Dellany Peace and Kelly Glover for some Spicy Girl Talk. Sherry also heads to Boulevard 34 and learns how to make an easy sugar scrub using household ingredients.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith interviews one of her heroes - supermodel Emme. Plus, Leah Cevoli, Teagan Brooke, and Dellany Peace join Sherry for some Spicy Girl Talk.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith talks to Joanne Rallo, Kelly Glover and Dellany Peace during Spicy Girl Talk on this week's Go Curvy. Plus, Christopher Styles shows you how to get wild and sexy hair and Brittney Yarbrough shares tips for keeping your makeup on when it's hot outside.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Katrina Parker stops by Go Curvy to sing her new song and talk to Sherry Lee Meredith. Plus, Sherry, Joanne Rallo, Kelly Glover and Leah Cevoli talk online dating during Spicy Girl Talk.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Joanne Rallo, Kelly Glover and Teagan Brooke for some Spicy Girl Talk on Go Curvy. Plus Sherry interviews Victoria Burrows, director of Star Paws Rescue, about finding dogs forever homes.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith talks to Lori Judd, Kim Johnson and Angela Rene' about 40 Plus Divas on Go Curvy. Plus Sherry learns how to make a signature scent at KleanSpa in Burbank and checks out Kippy's Ice Cream in Venice. Then Christopher Styles shows Sherry and Teagan Brooke how to create the perfect updo.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith interviews musician Scotty Grand, plus Scotty performs live on the show. Perfumer and cosmetic chemist Vince Spinnato gives you an inside look at what goes in to making your makeup.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Rosie Mercado, Dellany Peace, and Joanne Rallo to Go Curvy for Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Rosie shares her makeup tricks for summer with Sherry and model Teagan Brooke.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by actresses Eva Tingley, Leah Cevoli and Dellany Peace for Spicy Girl Talk. Sherry also interviews Tip Jones, editor-in-chief of POSE Magazine. Plus, Christopher Styles shares his tips for making sure your hair stays happy in the summer with Sherry and model Teagan Brooke.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Gregory Zarian, Joanne Rallo and Dellany Peace for Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Sherry interviews Sonya Renee, of the Body is Not an Apology, and heads to Long Beach to check out wedding gowns at Strut Bridal Salon. In beauty, Christopher Styles shows you how to do a faux bob on model Teagan Brooke.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Kelly Glover, Dellany Peace and Joanne Rallo for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Sherry interviews body image advocate Brittany Gibbons. Then Brittney Yarbrough and Christopher Styles share their must have hair and beauty products for summer.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes musician Scotty Grand for a live performance on Go Curvy. Scotty also joins Sherry, Dellany Peace and Teagan Brooke for some Spicy Girl Talk.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Megan Kimberling, Dellany Peace and Joanne Rallo join Sherry Lee Meredith for some Spicy Girl Talk on Go Curvy. Plus Brittney Yarbrough shares some of her favorite beauty products for summer with Sherry Lee Meredith and Teagan Brooke.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: This week's episode is all about dating. Sherry Lee Meredith talks to relationship expert Brandon Aki and he gives dating advice to a special guest. Plus Dellany Peace, Leah Cevoli, and Gio Messale join Sherry for some Spicy Girl Talk. Then Brittney Yarbrough shares some fun date night makeup ideas with model Teagan Brooke.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by relationship and lifestyle expert Gregory Zarian, Kelly Glover and Dellany Peace for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Gregory Zarian shares his tips for having self confidence, and Aida Danielle, of AIDA Cosmetics, talks about hot new makeup for summer.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Hayley Hasselhoff is Sherry Lee Meredith's special guest on this week's episode of Go Curvy. Plus Leah Cevoli, Joanne Rallo and Dellany Peace sit down for some Spicy Girl Talk. And Sherry Lee Meredith gets a special behind the scenes tour of the TCL Chinese Theatre.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith talks first dates with dating expert Brandon Aki. Plus Gio Messale, Dellany Peace and Teagan Brooke join Sherry for some Spicy Girl Talk.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: It's the premiere episode of season 2 of Go Curvy. Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Dellany Peace, Kelly Glover and Joanne Rallo for some Spicy Girl Talk.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith takes you behind the scenes of the new City Chic store in Culver City. Plus, musical guest Scotty Grand performs his new song "WITH" on this week's episode of Go Curvy.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith is joined by Linda Weinrib, Leah Cevoli and Dellany Peace for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Taylor Petenbrink shows Sherry a fun new updo to try.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith heads to Scottsdale to check out FAB Weekend. Plus, Dellany Peace, Marcus Lovingood and Jennifer Buckingham join Sherry for some Spicy Girl Talk.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Dellany Peace, Kelly Glover and Jennifer Buckingham for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Brandon Aki answers your relationship and dating questions.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith heads to City Chic to find out what fashion is hot for Fall on this week's Go Curvy. Plus, stylist Taylor Petenbrink shows Sherry Lee some fun new hairstyles to try for Fall.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: It's a very special Halloween episode of Go Curvy. Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Dellany Peace, Jennifer Buckingham and Linda Weinrib for some scary Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Taylor Petenbrink and Arlene Martinez turn Teagan Brooke into the Bride of Frankenstein.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Joanne Rallo, Kelly Glover and Dellany Peace for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Sherry Lee goes behind the scenes at Miss Plus Top Model and learns how to do a faux bob from Taylor Petenbrink.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Gregory Zarian, Dellany Peace and Danielle Cintron for some Spicy Girl Talk. In beauty, Taylor Petenbrink and Arlene Martinez show you how to get a high ponytail and smoky eye look. Plus Sherry Lee talks with Natasha Chilon-L'aiguille about her visit to Los Angeles, Liza Smith, Enamel Diction, and Curvaceous Inc. Magazine.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Sherry Lee Meredith welcomes Scotty Grand, Teagan Brooke and Dellany Peace for some Spicy Girl Talk. Plus, Scotty performs a new song live on the show. Dating and relationship expert Brandon Aki answers your questions, and hair and beauty team Taylor Petenbrink and Arlene Martinez are back with new tutorials. Sherry Lee also interviews Cynthia Decker and Molly Hopkins, aka the Double Divas, about Livi Rae Lingerie and how to find the perfect bra size.

imdb.plot outline: Go Curvy is an inspirational talk show for women of all shapes, sizes and lifestyles created and hosted by Sherry Lee Meredith. Go Curvy features celebrity interviews, cooking segments, and weekly beauty and fashion features designed to help viewers look and feel their very best.
imdb.title: Go Curvy
plot: _Go Curvy_ (qv) is an inspirational talk show for women of all shapes, sizes and lifestyles created and hosted by Sherry Lee Meredith.::WyTV
